items.sentence: There's no point in staying here any longer.
Tom Jackson won the election by a landslide.
How many galaxies are there in the universe?
Please use a pencil to write down your name.
I suppose that it's too late to do that now.
Tom realized Mary didn't like him very much.
Tom was interviewed by the local TV station.
Tom waited patiently for his meal to arrive.
Tom participated in a model U.N. conference.
I can't imagine myself getting into a fight.
Things are simpler now than they used to be.
I need to get Tom to show me how to do that.
I'm not exactly sure where I should do that.
I know that Tom is still willing to do that.
I know that Tom is going to want to do that.
I know that Tom is going to like doing that.
I know that Tom is going to let you do that.
I know that Tom is going to help us do that.
I know that Tom is doing that the wrong way.
I know that Tom is afraid to try to do that.
